altTitles.ja: グラマラスフェローズ

description.en:
A short story anthology featuring a great many "glamorous" bodies.

---
001 - **[Kaoru Mori] Ame-no-Uzume**: A glimpse at part of the myth of Amaterasu, focusing on Ame-no-Uzume's dance in front of the gods.
002 [冨明仁] フワリンモーニン
003 - **[Kanae Yamade] Thin & Thicc** (included in [Madowaseru Onnatachi](https://mangadex.org/title/87099c34-8946-4d76-8a6e-07ae02fc0936/dazed-and-confused))

005 - **[Hirona Takahashi] Legend of Yuhime** (included in [Glamorous Gathering Takahashi](https://mangadex.org/title/12b6736f-6620-4e10-9c26-5d4128de2111/glamorous-gathering-takahashi))

description.ja:
2冊合わせて400ページを超える描き下ろし漫画を収録する冊子。2017年12月から翌年3月発売分の単行本に付属する応募券を、『ハルタ』volume50 - volume52に付いている応募台紙に貼り応募する事で2冊分が全員に送付された。これに関連してvolume50 - volume52には八重樫莉子による告知漫画が掲載されている。

description.en: Freesia is set in an alternative Japanese society that is at war, and has passed a law legalizing retaliatory killings. If somebody kills your loved one, you are legally sanctioned to kill, or hire someone to kill, the victimizer. The manga is set around a character who works for a firm that specializes in these retaliatory killings.

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?  
  
- [Part 1 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1030773596430327808)
- [Part 2 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1044057437831979008)
- [Part 3 raw](https://twitter.com/i/moments/1065586182698889216)

altTitles.ja: みょーちゃん先生はかく語りき

description.en: Sasafune Miyoko, the nurse at a certain high school, is often asked for advice by the students. Almost every day someone comes to ask her about their worries, and this and that… But since these are high school students going through puberty, helping them is usually not that simple! Myō-chan-sensei is hard at work answering questions that are sure to make you blush like "Have you ever had sex outdoors?" or "I wonder which panties my boyfriend likes more".
description.ja:
生徒のためならなんでもシちゃう？熱血ポンコツ教師・みょーちゃん登場☆

とある高校の保健室の先生・笹舟みよかは生徒達の良き相談役として、今日も思春期爆発系質問にカラダを張って答えます！アオカンしたいって彼氏に言われた？ 乳輪が大きいのが悩み？全部みょーちゃん先生にお任せあれ！！！

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en: A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...

title.en: The Sea Painted by the Moonlight

description.en:
Naranda is a country where mermaids are said to have lived in the sea once upon a time.
Yeonji joins the Naranda Historical Research Institute as an intern to prove it.
She has been dreaming of a mermaid since she was a child.
At the institute, she meets her team leader, Hae-rang, who looks like the mermaid from her dreams.
She tries her best to impress Hae-rang, but she's not impressed with her...

The mystery of her past life, sinking to the bottom of the sea with the kingdom of Naranda begins to unfold!
description.ko:
옛날옛적 바닷 속에 인어가 살았다고 전해지는 나라 '나란다'
그걸 증명하기 위해 연구하는 '나란다 역사 연구소'의 인턴으로 들어간 "연지"
어릴 때부터 계속 인어 꿈을 꾸는 그녀는 연구소에서 자신의 꿈에 나온 인어와 닮은 팀장 "해랑"을 만나게 된다.
해랑에게 잘보이고 싶은 연지는 열심히 노력해보지만 해랑은 쌀쌀맞기만 한데...

나란다 왕국과 함께 바닷속에 가라앉은 전생의 비밀이 풀리기 시작한다!

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Star Blossom

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー スターブロッサム

description.en:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.

---

- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)
description.ja: 「挑戦なくして、得られるものなど何もない」　見習いトレーナー・椿が出会ったのは、ガラスの脚を抱えたデビュー前のウマ娘・サクラローレル。半人前の2人が見た頂点への夢は、無謀なのか――。

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: Records of the Demonic Path’s Return

description.en: The main character Myeong-woon has escaped to a faraway sanctuary to avoid the Heavenly Demon God Cult's fight for power. However, as he did not coincide with the Throne's Will, he was unable to avoid strife. To make Myeong-un stir a fight within his family, the Heavenly Demon God Cult's Leader, Myeonggak, visited him. Myeong-woon dies during his attempt to escape him. But right before he died, a voice spoke to him in his hazying consciousness. "…Do you regret it? Would you like to fight another time?" Myeong-woon believes he died after this voice away but he opens his eyes and…

Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)  
[Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)  
[Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)  
[Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)  
[Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

altTitles.en: Hoshi of the Garden of Girls

description.en:
Known for the compilation *"Captivated, by You"*, Wayama’s first serialization in a Josei magazine is a comedy set in an all-girls school about a Japanese language teacher, Hoshi-sensei, and the carefree play that his students involve him in.  
  
The story starts when Kagawa, a student, delivers the class journal to Hoshi-sensei.   
  
As the students play word chain game "Shiritori" in the form of drawings in the remarks column of the journal, Hoshi-sensei becomes troubled…

---
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award for Manga in 2022**

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**   
- Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>)
- Alternative English version by [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>)
- In French by [Pika](<https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity>)   
- In Italian by [Star Comics](<https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315>)   
- In Polish by [Kotori](<http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/>)   
- In Russian by [Istari](<https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/to-your-eternity/>)   
- In German by [Egmont](<https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html>)   
- In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019)
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)
description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en: A man dies a mysterious death just outside Shinjuku Station. Eight years later, his son, Yodomi Arakawa, is leading a tranquil life until he meets…an invisible man?! And to learn the truth behind his father's death, Yodomi will have to become invisible himself...

description.de: Bereichert durch die Erfahrungen, die sie im ersten Teil ihrer Story gemacht hat, wandert Emanon nun durch das Japan der späten 1960er Jahre. Im Laufe ihrer Wanderungen trifft sie auf diverse Menschen, bei denen sie einen mehr als nur bleibenden Eindruck hinterlässt. Gleichzeitig bringen die kumulierten Erinnerungen von mehr als drei Milliarden Jahren jedoch nicht nur Vorteile mit sich, was sie mehr als nur deutlich bemerkt, wenn sie sich einer Person erklärt, die genau genommen gar nicht existieren dürfte …
description.en:
In the sequel to "Memories of Emanon," our eponymous heroine continues her journey through time, carrying with her 3 billion years of memories. 
When Emanon reunites with her long lost twin brother, confessions are made and secrets are revealed that will make her question her way of life and the very nature of her existence.   
  
The first half of volume 1 is the colored chapters "Wandering Emanon" (published before as Emanon Episode: 1).   
The second half is "Wandering Emanon '67" which is set before "Wandering Emanon."

Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby PisuPisu☆SupiSupi Golshi-chan

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 ピスピス☆スピスピ ゴルシちゃん

description.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby PisuPisu☆SupiSupi Golshi-chan is a spinoff gag manga, featuring Gold Ship as a kindergartener.

A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

altTitles.ja: 命がけでもたりないのさ

altTitles.en: Devoting Everything to My Wonderful Youth

description.en: Yuika Kagami is a 15 year old schoolgirl that is in the search of thrilling and exciting experiences. She ends up meeting with her school's "Game Club" and realizes that she might be able to fullfill her youth by driving a GTR R34 just as the one her father used to race with.

Karin, a new employee who worked at an unethical recruiting magazine production company for half a year, was wrecked both physically and mentally. One day, Yui-san, her senior and a health nerd, gave her a massage to relax her body. In return, Yui asked Karin to hug her to warm her body up.
description.ja:
ブラックな求人誌制作会社で、日々心と体を蝕まれる入社半年の新人・夏鈴
。ある日先輩で健康オタクの癒衣さんに、体をほぐすマッサージをしてもらうことになるが、その代わりに、癒衣さんの冷え性を良くするためハグをしてほしいと頼まれて…!?

疲れている全ての現代人に贈る、ほぐし＆癒し百合4コマ！

title.en: Shiretto Sugee Koto Iteru Gal: Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: しれっとすげぇこと言ってるギャル。ー私立パラの丸高校の日常ー

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiretto Sugee Koto Iteru Gal ~Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou~

altTitles.en: The Gals Who Always Say Insane Things: My Daily Life at a Private Paranormal High School

description.en:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction!
A very ordinary and supernatural daily life sent by the strongest and invincible gal with different abilities.

- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
description.ja: 青春＝友情、努力、未来予知!? 最強無敵の異能力ギャルが送る、ごくごく普通の超常的な日常。 累計再生数1.6億回！本作の元となったYoutubeチャンネル「私立パラの丸高校」では、みらい＆ へー子の最強異能力ギャルズの他、光やクラスメイト達の声優ボイス付き動画がたくさん見れるので、ぜひチェックしてみてください!!

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: She is the neighbor Angel, I am spoilt by her.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world — Lin Kai — visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...
description.fr: Dans un coin de la ville se trouve une boutique, en apparence normale, nommée le "Time Photo Studio". Les propriétaires de la boutique, Cheng Xiaoshi et Lu Guang, peuvent voyager dans le temps au travers de photos. Un jour, une étoile montante de l'opéra chinois, Lin Kai, visite leur studio et leur demande de trouver un enregistrement datant d'il y a 10 ans. Ils n'ont qu'une seule photo et qu'une chance...
description.zh: 在城市的某个角落，有一家看似普通的小店——时光照相馆。店主程小时和陆光可以通过照片，进入过去的时空。有一天，戏曲界新锐林凯来到了照相馆，委托程小时与陆光，寻找一份10年前的影像。照片只有1张，机会只有1次……

altTitles.en: From a Lady to the Queen

description.en:
"I will never love the Emperor."  
  
My sister Nilla, who became the Emperor's Queen after having dreamt of fairy tales and true loves, came back divorced and accused of high treason. Our family, the Rochesters, was mercilessly executed. But by some miracle, I came back in time, before Nilla was selected as the Emperor's Queen candidate.   
  
If I become queen in your stead, you and our family need not suffer. This life of yours can have a happy ending, sister. I promise.  


---

[Original Novel](https://www.justoon.co.kr/content/home/0ajd2ctb2ab7)  


---

[Official Japanese Translation](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=29319)  
[Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5642/)  
[Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://comico.com.tw/articleList.nhn?titleNo=3796)  
[Official French Translation](http://delitoon.com/webtoon/lady-to-queen)  
[Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Lady-to-Queen/3190)  
Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)
description.pt-br: “Eu nunca vou amar o imperador.” Minha irmã, que se tornou a rainha do imperador depois de sonhar com contos de fadas e amor verdadeiro, voltou divorciada e acusada de alta traição. Nossa família, os Rochesters foram impiedosamente executados. Mas, por algum milagre voltei no tempo antes dela ser selecionada como candidata á rainha do imperador. Se eu me tornar a rainha em seu lugar, você e nossa família não precisam sofrer. Sua vida poderá ter um final feliz irmã. Eu prometo.

description.en: Rakugo: A traditional form of Japanese storytelling, told orally by one sitting down. Often humorous, often filled with folly, rakugo has persisted throughout the ages with good reason. Within *Masterpiece Rakugo Complete Works*, 33 rakugo stories are closely adapted by George Akiyama, who gives them his own charming, chaotic touch.

"It seems like I'd like someone like you."

"You're really like a little pony." 

This is a slice-of-life of the romance and exploits of an adorkable and ditzy senior "little fox" and her dependable junior "little pony".
description.uk: "Здається, мені б сподобався хтось на кшталт тебе". "Ти справді як маленьке поні". Буденність про романтику та подвиги чарівної й навіженої Старшої "лисички" та її надійної Молодшої "поні".
description.zh: “我好像会喜欢你这样的人。” “你好像一匹小马。” 呆萌跳脱年上“小狐狸”和她的靠谱 “年下小马驹”的爱情事业双丰收日常 。

description.en: For the sake of his family, an average middle-aged man must go against a crime syndicate, by all means necessary.
description.pt: Pelo bem de sua filha, um homem de meia idade embarca na jornada de sua vida.
description.tr: Orta yaşlarında bir baba kızı ve ailesi uğruna her şeyi yapmaya hazır; suç karteline karşı koymak da buna dâhildir!

description.en:
One day, Momoko is attacked by Pluie, a demon who's after her keepsake ring left by her mother. Just then, the angel Limone gives Momoko the Sacred Mirror, allowing her to transform into the legendary Love Angel Wedding Peach and drive away demons! And so, Peach and her fellow angels fight to protect the lovers of the world from demons pursuing them for their "wave of love"...!
___
Chapter numbers for the Selene Scans version do not match up, but nothing is missing.
Short stories about two anthropomorphic white cats who have no respect and are just plain cruel. Dark humor warning.

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

title.en: There Is No True Peace in This World -Shin Kamen Rider SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja: 真の安らぎはこの世になく-シン・仮面ライダー SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Yasuragi wa Konoyo ni Naku -Shin Kamen Raidā Shokkā Saido-

altTitles.la: Nulla Mundo Pax Sincera: SHOCKER SIDE

description.en: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!
description.ja: 庵野秀明監督作品『シン・仮面ライダー』より、完全オリジナルの漫画プロジェクト！ 超豪華制作陣が『シン・仮面ライダー』作中最大の敵と、"SHOCKER"を描く、ダークヒーロー・ライジング・ストーリー！！

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: 怪 ～ayakashi～ 化猫 モノノ怪前日譚

description.en:
Set in the Edo period, Mononoke tells the story of a supernatural horror that lays siege to an aristocratic household, and of a mysterious apothecary who seeks to uncover the ugly truths that gave rise to the monstrosity in order to vanquish it before it destroys them all.

---

Published in 2007 & 2019.
description.ja: 「モノノ怪」シリーズその原点『化猫』、新装版で登場!江戸時代の武家・坂井家。この家にはなぜか、猫がいない。孫娘の輿入れが行われようとしたその日、花嫁は無残にも惨殺される。次々と起こる怪死事件。屋敷に居合わせた、謎の薬売りは告げる。これは化猫の仕業だと…。はじまりの物語『化猫』、ここに開帳。

altTitles.en: My Little Sister Is a Cat

description.en: The daily life of a young man, whose little sister is a cat.

altTitles.ja: なめて、かじって、ときどき愛でて

description.en:
I'm Haru. first year in high school. Please listen to my troubles. I accidentally gave my love letter to the number one problem child at school, Seishirou-kun…   
  
Even though I told him to give it back, he won't. He says I'm already his girlfriend…He'll chase me down if he sees me at school, he takes my lunch, keeps his eye on me, and e-even kisses me…Ah and doing perverted stuff…!!   
  
And he's also living at my place…. I'm definitely not his girlfriend, so please let me go already!!!
description.pt-br:
Meu nome é Haru. Estou no primeiro ano do ensino médio. Por favor, ouçam os meus problemas. Por engano eu entreguei a minha carta de amor ao garoto mais problemático da escola, Seishirou-kun…   
  
Embora tenha pedido para me devolver, ele não o fez. Ele disse que agora sou a sua namorada… Ele me persegue cada vez que me vê, pega meu almoço, fica de olho em mim, até mesmo me beija e faz coisas pervertidas comigo!!   
  
E pra finalizar… Agora ele vive na minha casa!! O que eu vou fazer?!

altTitles.th: อินาริมนตราสื่อรัก

altTitles.ja: いなり、こんこん、恋いろは。

description.en:
Fushimi Inari has a hopeless crush on her classmate Tanbabashi. One day, while trying to interact with him, she accidentally humiliates him in front of the whole class. He refuses to accept her apologies, and, to make matters worse, she discovers that he probably has a crush on their incredibly cute classmate Sumizome.  
  
She has all these things in mind when she is summoned by Uka-no-Mitama-no-kami, a pale fox goddess. In return for rescuing a little fox-spirit creature before school that day, the goddess offers to grant a single wish of Inari's. Without thinking, she blurts out that she wants to be Sumizome. As one might expect, this wish does not go nearly as well as Inari had hoped, and the kindly goddess breaks a goddess-rule to give Inari the ability to change herself back. Now, Inari can change her own shape at will, and using her new skill is very tempting as she keeps trying to win Tanbabashi's heart. But if Inari flaunts her ability, both she and the goddess might end up in trouble with Amaterasu!
description.pl: Fushimi Inari zakochała się w swoim koledze z klasy, Tanbabashi. Pewnego dnia upokarza go przed całą klasą, chcąc się do niego zbliżyć. Żeby było jeszcze gorzej – podejrzewa, że zakochał się w jej znajomej z klasy, Sumizome. Wracając do domu przez świątynię Inari, bohaterka ratuje małego liska. Lisek okazał się podwładnym bogini Uka, właścicielki tejże świątyni. Za pomoc liskowi bogini obdarowuje Inari mocą przemieniania się w osoby, które zna. Czy Inari mądrze wykorzysta swoją nową moc?
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno de Fushimi Inari, que está perdidamente apaixonada pelo seu colega de classe Koji Tanbabashi. Num fatídico dia, ela decide confessar o seu amor por ele, mas situações inusitadas acabam por fazê-la humilhar o garoto na frente da classe inteira. Angustiada por não conseguir se desculpar com Tanbabashi, Inari acaba indo para o seu porto seguro, o Templo Inari. Vendo o sofrimento de Inari a deusa Fuka-sama decide lhe conceder um desejo. Qual será o desejo de Inari? Acompanhe essa estória e descubra o que acontecerá com Inari depois de realizar o seu desejo.

description.en:
Yashima is a city of 2 halves. Upper Yashima is where the humans safely live in their homes without much threat or worry. Lower Yashima on the other hand, is where humans who aren't so lucky live alongside the half beast-like beings known as kemono, and creatures known as makatsuhi. Creatures without any emotions or signs of intelligence that seem to function purely on instinct, and prey on humans and kemono alike. The only thing protecting humans from makatsuhi are the kemono of Zero Squad. A special class within Akatsuki Academy that gathers up kemono with special powers and trains them on how to use their powers to protect the humans and kemono alike from the threat of the makatsuhi. The problem is that humans see kemono as dangerous beasts just like the makatsuhi. Yuu is a human who has always had impossibly bad luck wherever he goes. On his way to a new school, he gets kidnapped by kemono who hold a grudge against humans, gets attacked by a makatsuhi, and is helped by a kemono named Riko. The next thing he realizes, Yuu has been transferred into Zero Squad and is forced to learn to fight.  
  
This is the story of Zero Squad and their battle to find their place in a world that sees them as a threat.
description.ru: Мицумине Ю переводится в школу в новом городе и сразу же сталкивается с неожиданными проблемами.

description.en: In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

altTitles.es-la: Summer of Tension Regreso al Mar

description.en: The legend has it that once upon a time, a pact was sealed between the Shinto priest of the town of Amide and a mermaid. Ever since, abundant fishing has guaranteed the town’s prosperity. This pact has always been honored by the priests of the Yashiro family. However, the legend has attracted both media and property developers, and the acting priest has acceded to their demands. Yosuke, youngest of the Yashiro family, has doubts about the existence of the mermaid, but will soon change his opinion as strange occurrences begin to unfold…

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.th: 【เกิดใหม่เป็นลูกโอชิ】

altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

description.en: Something monstrous rises up from the sea and nearly sinks a Japanese fishing boat. The sole survivor tells a tale that no one wants to believe. But when a Russian nuclear submarine is destroyed in the same waters, the world is forced to face the truth: Godzilla has returned! This manga classic was originally published by Dark Horse in black and white in 1988.

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

description.en:
Yuuki, a transfer student, is Aida's neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Aida tries to get friendly with Yuuki, but their conversations lead nowhere. On the other hand, when it comes to their situation as neighbors, Yuuki...

title.en: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi: Sui no Daibouken

description.en: A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective.
